RNKHTM.Title: RNK Hide 'Em
RNKHTM.Settings.Config.Name: Hide Hotbar Buttons
RNKHTM.Settings.Config.Label: Configure Hidden Buttons
RNKHTM.Settings.Config.Hint: Select which hotbar buttons to hide from players.
RNKHTM.Settings.HideBackground.Name: Hide Hotbar Background
RNKHTM.Settings.HideBackground.Hint: Removes the black background and box shadow.
RNKHTM.Settings.ApplyToGM.Name: Apply to GM
RNKHTM.Settings.ApplyToGM.Hint: If enabled, the hidden slots will also be hidden for the GM (useful for testing).
RNKHTM.Settings.HideLeftControls.Name: Hide Left Controls
RNKHTM.Settings.HideLeftControls.Hint: Hides the directory controls (e.g., macro directory, sound) on the left side of the hotbar.
RNKHTM.Settings.HideRightControls.Name: Hide Right Controls
RNKHTM.Settings.HideRightControls.Hint: Hides the page controls (arrows, lock) on the right side of the hotbar.
RNKHTM.Config.Title: Hide Hotbar Buttons Configuration
RNKHTM.Config.Notes: Select the hotbar slots you want to HIDE from players.
RNKHTM.Config.General.HideBackgroundHint: Removes the background and box shadow from the hotbar.
RNKHTM.Config.General.ApplyToGMHint: If enabled, settings will also affect the GM view (useful for testing).
RNKHTM.Config.General.HideLeftControlsHi: Hides the directory controls (macro directory, sound) on the left side.
RNKHTM.Config.General.HideRightControlsH: Hides the page controls (arrows, lock) on the right side.
RNKHTM.Config.General.OpacityHint: Set transparency level for visible hotbar slots (100% = fully visible).
RNKHTM.Config.General.AnimationDurationH: How long animations take when hiding/showing elements (0 = instant).
RNKHTM.Config.Slots.Notes: Select individual hotbar slots to hide from players.
RNKHTM.Config.Pages.Notes: Hide entire hotbar pages at once (10 slots per page).
RNKHTM.Config.Presets.Notes: Save and load preset configurations for different scenarios.
RNKHTM.Config.Advanced.Notes: Import, export, and share your configurations.
RNKHTM.Config.Advanced.ExportHint: Download your current settings as a JSON file.
RNKHTM.Config.Advanced.ImportHint: Load settings from a previously exported JSON file.
RNKHTM.Config.Advanced.ShareHint: Generate a code to share your configuration with others.
RNKHTM.Config.Advanced.LoadSharedHint: Load a configuration from a share code.
